reportTitle: 肠道菌群与人体健康的关系研究
reportEnTitle: Research on the Relationship Between Gut Microbiota and Human Health
summary: 本报告详细讨论了肠道菌群在人体健康中的重要作用，探讨了肠道菌群失调与多种疾病之间的关联，以及通过调节肠道菌群来改善健康的潜在方法。
enSummary: This report discusses the important role of gut microbiota in human health, explores the connection between gut flora dysbiosis and various diseases, and potential methods to improve health by regulating gut microbiota.
